effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
